ingredients: 2  bananas, mashed,   +   1/2 cup milk, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 3 teaspoons baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 2  eggs, beaten, 1 tablespoon margarine, melted, 1 quart vegetable oil for frying,   +   1/2 cup confectioners' sugar, or as needed
nutrition: Total Fat 19g 24%, Saturated Fat 3g 16%, Cholesterol 64mg 21%, Sodium 427mg 19%, Total Carbohydrate 53g 19%, Dietary Fiber 2g 8%, Total Sugars 16g, Protein 8g, Vitamin C 4mg 18%, Calcium 141mg 11%, Iron 3mg 14%, Potassium 240mg 5%
